briefTitle: Efficacy of TAP Block in Cesarean Section Patients

armGroups.label: Placebo
interventionNames: Procedure: TAP block using Normal Saline

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Healthy pregnant women

Exclusion Criteria:

* Allergy to local anesthetics

outcomeMeasures.title: Effect of Transversus Abdominis Plane (TAP) Block Using Either 0.5% or 0.25% Bupivacaine on Analgesia for Cesarean Section Patients When Compared to Placebo.
outcomeMeasures.description: The total the number of Patient Controlled Analgesia (PCA) boluses used by the patients postoperatively within 24 hours
